title: Sampler, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: cross stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Floral borders surrounding the alphabet and initials "F. D. M. L."; scenes showing a woman in a gate with vases of flowers, a bird, and a wreath with the initial "B".

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: cross stitches on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-9.
